itemLabel: Gruffydd Evans, Baron Evans of Claughton

wikipedia_page.main: David Thomas Gruffydd Evans, Baron Evans of Claughton, DL (9 February 1928 – 22 March 1992) was a British solicitor and politician. He was educated at Birkenhead School and, as Lord Evans, held the office of Deputy Lieutenant of Merseyside. He was created a life peer as Baron Evans of Claughton, of Claughton in the County of Merseyside, on 24 April 1978.
